mainText:
Promo:Bank of Entitlement - Where your sense of entitlement is our top priority!

Visit Bank of Entitlement dot com for more.

ENTITLEMENT STORY: Story:So there I was, strolling into my local Bank of Entitlement branch, demanding the finest red carpet treatment a CEO of my caliber deserves. As soon as I walked in, I noticed they had rearranged the furniture, messing with my Feng Shui vibes. Outraged, I threw myself dramatically onto the nearest velvet sofa, bellowing for the manager like a modern-day monarch in distress.The bank tellers, with their meek smiles and trembling hands, finally managed to summon the manager-a poor soul who clearly didn't know who he was dealing with. I unleashed a tirade of complaints, expressing my utter disbelief that my designated seat had been moved a whole foot to the right.But I wasn't done yet. Oh no. I demanded they bring in a team of expert Feng Shui consultants to realign the entire branch to my liking. I mean, who do they think they are, disrupting the energy flow of a successful business mogul?After a melodramatic standoff that had other customers staring in awe, the bank staff scrambled to appease my demands. And with a smug grin, I finally reclined on my reinstated throne, feeling vindicated in my pursuit of the perfect banking ambiance.Because at Bank of Entitlement, my comfort comes first. And in the end, the world realigned itself to revolve around Hot Josh once again.
